scripts.dev: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../.env ] && . ../.env; set +a; docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up'
scripts.dev:down: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../.env ] && . ../.env; set +a; docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v'
scripts.up: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../.env ] && . ../.env; set +a; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d'
scripts.down: bash -lc 'set -a; [ -f ../.env ] && . ../.env; set +a; docker compose -f docker-compose.yml down -v'
